channel.title: Rotten Tomatoes on Robert Myles McDonnell
channel.description: Recent content in Rotten Tomatoes on Robert Myles McDonnell

item.title: Ranking Brad Pitt’s Movies in R
item.description: So I saw this blog post, in which Pretty Famous ranked every one of Brad Pitt’s movies (I have no idea how I came across it, I’m not particularly a movie buff or a fan of Señor Pitt, but anyway). Then I wondered how easy/hard it would be to do something like that in R. Pretty Famous used a few sources, but here I’m going to stick to Rotten Tomatoes, since it’s a pretty well-known movie ratings site, maybe the most well-known.
